info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 19 at 6:08PM MDT until August 19 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of south central New Mexico, including the following county, Dona Ana and western Texas, including the following county, El Paso.
* WHEN...Until 715 PM MDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 608 PM MDT, Traffic cameras and broadcast media reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Flooding impacts will continue, but no additional rainfall is expected. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... West El Paso, Santa Teresa and Sunland Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; El Paso, TX
